Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 30 for SLE 12 SP3)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 30 for SLE 12 SP3)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.180-94_113 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2020-10757: Fixed an issue where remaping hugepage DAX to anon mmap could have caused user PTE access (bsc#1172437).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution for Non-Commercial usage (CC-BY-NC-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3-LTSS
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3-LTSS

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux Kernel in versions after 4.5-rc1 in the way mremap handled DAX Huge Pages. This flaw allows a local attacker with access to a DAX enabled storage to escalate their privileges on the system.
